tools: [{"name": "search_wikipedia", "description": "在维基百科上搜索一个主题", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"topic": {"type": "string", "description": "搜索的主题"}}, "required": ["topic"]}}]

query: 我正在寻找一台新笔记本电脑，但我不想花费超过1000美元。你能帮我找到一台吗？
tools: [{"name": "search_product", "description": "根据产品名称或类别搜索", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"query": {"type": "string", "description": "搜索查询（产品名称或类别）"}, "max_price": {"type": "number", "description": "产品的最高价格"}}, "required": ["query"]}}]

query: 你好，我打算这个周末去徒步旅行。你能推荐一些徒步路线吗？
tools: [{"name": "search_hiking_trails", "description": "根据标准搜索徒步旅行路线", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"location": {"type": "string", "description": "徒步道的所在地"}, "difficulty_level": {"type": "string", "description": "徒步道的难度级别"}, "distance_range": {"type": "string", "description": "徒步道的距离范围"}}, "required": []}}, {"name": "calculate_shipping_cost", "description": "计算包裹的运输成本，根据其重量和尺寸", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"weight": {"type": "number", "description": "这个包裹的重量，单位是千克"}, "length": {"type": "number", "description": "包装的长度以厘米为单位"}, "width": {"type": "number", "description": "包装的宽度，以厘米为单位"}, "height": {"type": "number", "description": "包装的高度以厘米为单位"}}, "required": ["weight", "length", "width", "height"]}}]

query: 你好，你可以帮我验证一下我的邮箱地址吗？
tools: [{"name": "validate_email", "description": "验证电子邮件地址是否正确格式化", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"email": {"type": "string", "format": "email", "description": "验证电子邮件地址"}}, "required": ["email"]}}]

query: 你好，我想计算我的BMI。我体重70公斤，身高1.75米。
tools: [{"name": "calculate_bmi", "description": "计算身体质量指数（BMI）", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"weight": {"type": "number", "description": "体重（以千克为单位）"}, "height": {"type": "number", "description": "身高（以米为单位）"}}, "required": ["weight", "height"]}}, {"name": "calculate_area", "description": "计算形状的面积", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"shape": {"type": "string", "description": "需要计算面积的形状"}, "dimensions": {"type": "object", "description": "这个形状的尺寸"}}, "required": ["shape", "dimensions"]}}]

query: 我有一些鸡肉、花椰菜和奶酪。你能帮我找一道食谱吗？
tools: [{"name": "search_recipes", "description": "根据食材搜索食谱", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"ingredients": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}, "description": "寻找的成分"}, "dietary_restrictions": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}, "description": "饮食限制考虑"}}, "required": ["ingredients"]}}]

query: 我在寻找一本阿加莎·克里斯蒂的侦探小说。
tools: [{"name": "search_books", "description": "根据关键词搜索书籍", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"keywords": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}, "description": "搜索的关键词"}, "author": {"type": "string", "description": "作者的名字"}, "genre": {"type": "string", "description": "这本书的类型"}}, "required": ["keywords"]}}]

query: 我需要一个1到100之间的随机数。
tools: [{"name": "generate_random_number", "description": "在给定的范围内生成一个随机数", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"min": {"type": "integer", "description": "范围的最小值"}, "max": {"type": "integer", "description": "范围的最大值"}}, "required": ["min", "max"]}}]

query: 我想创建一个新账户。
tools: [{"name": "create_user_account", "description": "创建一个新的用户账户", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"username": {"type": "string", "description": "账户的用户名"}, "password": {"type": "string", "description": "该账户的密码"}, "email": {"type": "string", "description": "用户的电子邮件地址"}}, "required": ["username", "password", "email"]}}]

query: 我看到了一件我很喜欢的连衣裙。它的原价是200美元，但现在正在打八折。你能告诉我现在它多少钱吗？
tools: [{"name": "calculate_discount", "description": "计算折扣价格", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"original_price": {"type": "number", "description": "原价"}, "discount_percentage": {"type": "number", "description": "折扣百分比"}}, "required": ["original_price", "discount_percentage"]}}]
